recipes.startdescription:
Pumpkins and apples are in season.

[This will yield a Sack of Vegetables. Consider it with a sepcific soul to reveal the contents. Considering with Health or Chor will Always consume it.

Marrows, leeks, and onions are in season.

[This will yield a Basket of Vegetables. Consider it with a sepcific soul to reveal the contents. Considering with Health or Chor will Always consume it.]

Marrows, leeks, and onions are in season.

[This will yield a Basket of Vegetables. Consider it with a sepcific soul to reveal the contents. Considering with Health or Chor will Always consume it.]

recipes.Label: Open A Basket of Vegetables With My Mettle
recipes.StartDescription:
This one is filled with pumpkins 

[Considering a Sack of Vegetables with Health consumes it. Considering with a different soul will open it.]
